item.title: Stuff without the stuff
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description:
by? Simba tango

There was a discussion on the tango dj mailing list a while ago about people wanting “stuff without the stuff”. In other words, tango (dance) without tango (music). An oxymoron, one would think.

Stephen Brown put it so well with his little story:

> > A number of years ago, I was in a coffee shop that offered coffee prepared many different ways. One of the ways was decaffeinated coffee with artificial sweetener and artificial cream. They called the result "Why Bother?" > >
